allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Automic ETL - AI-Augmented Data Lakehouse Platform

Features:
- Medallion architecture (Bronze/Silver/Gold layers) with Delta Lake
- LLM-augmented ETL capabilities (schema inference, entity extraction, NL queries)
- Multiple connectors: databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, Snowflake, BigQuery, MongoDB),
  APIs (Salesforce, HubSpot, Stripe, REST), files (CSV, JSON, Parquet), unstructured (PDF)
- Cloud storage support: AWS S3, GCS, Azure Blob
- SCD Type 2 slowly changing dimensions support
- Data validation and quality framework
- Lineage tracking and visualization
- Job orchestration and scheduling
- Notification system (email, Slack, webhook, PagerDuty)
- Authentication with RBAC and superadmin support
- Streamlit UI with theming, components, and dashboard widgets

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add advanced UI features: state management, search, shortcuts, exports

New features:
- Centralized state management (state.py):
  - Global StateManager singleton
  - Notification system with toast support
  - Real-time lakehouse statistics tracking
  - Navigation history with back support
  - User preferences management

- Keyboard shortcuts and accessibility (shortcuts.py):
  - Ctrl+K command palette
  - Navigation shortcuts (Ctrl+H/I/P/D/L/Q/M/S)
  - ARIA labels for screen readers
  - Skip-to-content link
  - Keyboard focus indicators

- Notification system (notifications.py):
  - Toast notifications with auto-dismiss
  - Notification panel with history
  - Alert banners for important messages
  - Support for success/error/warning/info types

- Data export functionality (export.py):
  - Export to CSV, JSON, Excel, Parquet, SQL
  - Export dialogs with format selection
  - Chart export (PNG, SVG, HTML)
  - Report generation (HTML, Markdown)
  - Bulk export with ZIP packaging

- Global search (search.py):
  - Search across tables, pipelines, connectors, queries, docs
  - Command palette with keyboard navigation
  - Search history tracking
  - Quick results in sidebar

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add streaming connectors, open-source integrations, and REST API

New Features:
- Streaming Connectors:
  - Kafka connector with consumer/producer, Schema Registry, Avro support
  - AWS Kinesis connector with shard management, EFO support
  - Google Pub/Sub connector with async streaming

- Open Source Integrations:
  - Apache Spark: Delta Lake, Iceberg, distributed processing
  - dbt: SQL transformations, model management, docs generation
  - Great Expectations: Data validation, profiling, checkpoints
  - Apache Airflow: DAG generation, job orchestration via REST API
  - MLflow: Experiment tracking, model registry, pipeline logging
  - OpenMetadata: Data catalog, lineage, governance

- REST API (FastAPI):
  - /api/v1/pipelines - Pipeline CRUD and execution
  - /api/v1/tables - Table management and data preview
  - /api/v1/queries - SQL and natural language query execution
  - /api/v1/connectors - Connector configuration and testing
  - /api/v1/lineage - Data lineage graph and impact analysis
  - /api/v1/jobs - Job scheduling and monitoring
  - /api/v1/health - Health checks and metrics

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add multi-tenant support with company management and superadmin controls

Multi-Tenant Architecture:
- Company model with status, tiers, limits, settings, and usage tracking
- CompanyMembership for user-company relationships with roles
- UserInvitation system with token-based acceptance
- TenantContext for request-scoped company isolation
- Subscription tiers: Free, Starter, Professional, Enterprise

Company Management (CompanyManager):
- Full CRUD operations for companies
- Member management (add, remove, update roles)
- Invitation system with email and expiration
- Usage tracking and limit enforcement
- Ownership transfer capability

Superadmin Controls (SuperadminController):
- GlobalSettings for platform-wide configuration
- Maintenance mode with allowed IPs
- Company oversight (approve, suspend, tier changes)
- User management across all companies
- Create/revoke superadmin privileges
- User impersonation for support
- System health monitoring
- Comprehensive audit logging

REST API Endpoints:
- /api/v1/companies - Company CRUD, members, invitations
- /api/v1/admin - Superadmin controls, settings, health

UI Pages:
- Company Admin page for company settings and member management
- Superadmin Dashboard with platform overview, company/user management

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
